Download NJ car accident records for a given year

Source: R/download_data.R
get_njtr1.Rd

Download NJ car accident records for a given year

get_njtr1(year, type)

Arguments

year

Year to download crash data
type

The table of NJDOT crash data to download

Value

tibble of all reported accidents for the year

Examples

get_njtr1(year = 2019, type = "Pedestrians")

#> # A tibble: 7,946 x 35
#>    id             pedestrian_numb… physical_conditi… address_city  address_state
